#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;

int main()
{
    ll test;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        ll n,a,b,i;
        ll start,last,sum=0,mid;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a>>b;
            mid= (b/a)+1;
            start=b;
            last= start+ (mid-1)*(-a);
            sum+= (mid*(start+last))/2;
        }
       // cout<<sum<<endl;
        if(sum%2==0)
        cout<<"NO\n";
        else
        cout<<"YES\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
